text: Jorge Aravena (; born October 1, 1969) is Peruvian-Venezuelan telenovela actor. He is known for his role in telenovelas such as Girasoles Para Lucia, La Revancha, Secreto de Amor, and Mi Vida Eres Tu. ==Biography== Jorge was born in Lima to Chilean father Jorge Luis Aravena and Peruvian mother Varo Masías.Jorge Aravena Datos biográficos At the age of 10, his parents moved to Venezuela where he grew up and started his career. In 1995, he married Jenny Martínez. He had three children from his marriage: Jorge Luis, Claudia Valentina and Luis Fernando.Jorge Aravena However, he separated from Jenny in 2005 and filed for divorce in 2007. ==Telenovelas== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#b0c4de; text-align:center;" !
